title: High‑detail tattoos in Tampa
subtitle: Online booking and aftercare with protective film (Saniderm/Emalla).
aftercare_md:
**Aftercare (protective film 7 days)**
- Keep Saniderm/Emalla **on for 7 days**. Replace only if it peels off.
- Avoid submerging (pools, bath, ocean) while the film is on.
- After removal: wash gently, pat dry, apply thin moisturizer 2–3× daily.
- Avoid sun and tight clothes for 2 weeks.
